definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: Our production was first moved there, too, as have our administrative departments in the meantime.
sentences.chinese: 我们的生产线与行政部门很迅速的搬移至当地。

sentences.english: The administration's diplomatic efforts are particularly delicate with South Korea.
sentences.chinese: 行政部门的外交成果和韩国之间是很特别微妙的。

sentences.english: We have all the administrative depart- ments there.
sentences.chinese: 我们所有的行政部门都在那里。

sentences.english: Physical health qualifications of blood donors shall be laid down by the department of public health under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 献血者的身体健康条件由国务院卫生行政部门规定。

sentences.english: That's why my Administration is kicking off the Year of Strong Fathers, Strong Families.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么我的行政部门启动了父亲年，家庭年。

sentences.english: The Alumnae Association is my link to the school's present administration.
sentences.chinese: 女校友协会是我和现在学校行政部门之间的纽带。

sentences.english: The National Metrological Verification System shall be worked out by the metrological administrative department of the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 国家计量检定系统表由国务院计量行政部门制定。
登记手续，并到劳动保障行政部门办理变更备案手续。

sentences.english: The President heads the executive branch and appoints the cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 总统亲自领导行政部门并且委任内阁。

sentences.english: The model of the labor contract shall be formulated by the administrative department of labor and social security of the municipality.
sentences.chinese: 劳动合同书由市劳动和社会保障行政部门制定范本。

sentences.english: Disputes over recognized cultural relics shall be referred to the administrative department of cultural relics at the provincial level for a ruling.
sentences.chinese: 认定文物发生争议的，由省级文物行政部门作出裁定。

sentences.english: We have all the administrative departments there.
sentences.chinese: 我们所有的行政部门都在部里。

sentences.english: And of course, you need a hospital administration that is accommodating, " she said.
sentences.chinese: 当然你也需要医院行政部门的通融，”她说道。

sentences.english: Specifically, the administrative department of labor of the State Council shall be in charge of the promotion of employment nationwide.
sentences.chinese: 国务院劳动行政部门具体负责全国的促进就业工作。

sentences.english: Senior administration officials said that no staff changes were imminent.
sentences.chinese: 高级行政部门的官员说目前没有任何人事变动。

sentences.english: However, the implementation of the guidelines may differ from one administration to another.
sentences.chinese: 然而，指导方针的实施各个行政部门可能有所不同。

definition: to return to one's original trade/to put (a business etc) under the administration of the relevant central authority/(the) relevant (department in charge of sth)
government (viewed as an organization)/institutions of government/government office
